resources.string:
PadLock requires a special Accessibility Service to secure your device. 

This service is used to monitor for the applications that you want to be locked. When PadLock notices that you have launched an application that you want to lock, it will secure the application with a custom lock screen. 

Please select the 'PadLock' Accessibility Service from the Settings menu and enable the service.

PadLock needs this service to monitor which apps launch on your device. 

It will not capture any personal data.
It does not connect to the Internet. 
It will only watch the apps you launch and lock the ones you request.
PadLock will not be activated until you set a PIN code.
Click the button to get started.
Locks applications based on the app that they were installed with
Locking is controlled by package. If the package is locked (from the list) this activity will lock too
Locking, even by package is ignored. This activity will never be locked
Always lock this activity, even if the package is not locked

This is a lightweight application which will improve your device's security by protecting your applications from prying eyes. Lock applications with a special password to keep your device safe and secure. 

PadLock is free to use, and entirely open source! You can view the source online at: 

https://github.com/pyamsoft/padlock 

Get ready for a safer device!
Please enable the PadLock service to continue

One last thing is the terms of usage. You must read this! 

Because PadLock can lock your applications, you may experience difficulty using your device if you forget the password that you use to unlock secured applications. 

This password is stored locally on your device and is never transmitted or used in any other way. You are the sole individual who would know what your password is. 

By using PadLock, you assume the responsibility of remembering your password for the applications you choose to protect. By continuing, you agree that forgetting the password used to lock your applications may result in certain functions of your device becoming inaccessible, and that pyamsoft will not be held liable for any reason.

Get started by first creating a special PIN to secure applications. All applications that are selected to be locked will be secured with this PIN, and will require it to unlock applications in the future. \n\nMake a strong PIN that is easy to remember, but please know that there are no requirements for your PIN.
Select an entry on the list to view detailed information about which parts of the application are locked. \n\nYou can set more specific options for locking applications in this detail dialog.

Toggle the switches into the ON state to lock an entire application. This will cause PadLock to secure the requested application. \n\nIn this mode, unlocking a single screen in an application will unlock the entire application for that session.
